ancientkraft_rechapter.name: AncientKraft Rechapter
ancientkraft_rechapter.description: The ultimate RPG adventure experience - completely rebuilt with revolutionary magic, next-gen combat, and expanded worlds. Now without LAG!

onepieceworlds2.name: One Piece World S2
onepieceworlds2.description: Master advanced Haki, discover rare Devil Fruits, and conquer the New World in this enhanced One Piece experience.

luminakraft_world.name: LuminaKraft World
luminakraft_world.description: Custom world, unique dungeons, scaling mobs, skills, economy, land claiming, PvP control, live map.

onepieceworld.name: One Piece World
onepieceworld.description: Live the great adventure of One Piece: find Devil Fruits and master the seas.

ancientkraft.name: AncientKraft
ancientkraft.description: RPG-style Adventure modpack with custom magic system, custom combat, and more

pt-the_full_course.name: PT: The Full Course
pt-the_full_course.description: Flagship survival server with custom plugins and events

ancientkraft_rechapter.title: Revolutionary Magic System
ancientkraft_rechapter.description: Experience a completely redesigned magic system with advanced spellcrafting, elemental mastery, and magical progression paths

ancientkraft_rechapter.title: Next-Gen Combat Mechanics
ancientkraft_rechapter.description: Engage in dynamic battles with overhauled combat systems, weapon skills, and tactical abilities that redefine PvP and PvE

ancientkraft_rechapter.title: Expanded Ancient Realms
ancientkraft_rechapter.description: Explore vast reimagined worlds with new biomes, enhanced dungeons, legendary artifacts, and secrets waiting to be discovered

ancientkraft_rechapter.title: Enhanced Guild Systems
ancientkraft_rechapter.description: Join improved guilds with advanced progression, territory control, guild wars, and collaborative content based on ancient realms

onepieceworlds2.title: Advanced Devil Fruits
onepieceworlds2.description: Discover rare and powerful Devil Fruits with unique combinations and evolution mechanics.

onepieceworlds2.title: Advanced Haki System
onepieceworlds2.description: Master all three types of Haki with a deep progression system and special techniques.

onepieceworlds2.title: New World Exploration
onepieceworlds2.description: Venture into the dangerous New World, where stronger enemies and greater treasures await.

onepieceworlds2.title: Enhanced Multiplayer
onepieceworlds2.description: Create your own pirate crew, establish territories, and engage in epic naval battles.

luminakraft_world.title: Optimized Survival with Paper
luminakraft_world.description: Enjoy a lag-free and stable survival experience thanks to the power of Paper server software.

luminakraft_world.title: Wide Version Compatibility
luminakraft_world.description: Play on your preferred version, as LuminaKraft World supports clients from 1.9.x all the way up to 1.21.x.

luminakraft_world.title: Enhanced Gameplay with Plugins
luminakraft_world.description: Discover a variety of custom plugins that add exciting features and improve the overall survival experience.

luminakraft_world.title: Thriving Community
luminakraft_world.description: Become part of a friendly and active community of players who share your passion for survival and adventure.

onepieceworld.title: Devil Fruits
onepieceworld.description: Consume powerful fruits that will grant you special abilities, but beware of the sea!

onepieceworld.title: Haki and Fighting Styles
onepieceworld.description: Master Haki, martial arts and combat styles inspired by characters like Sanji or Zoro.

onepieceworld.title: Explore the Grand Line
onepieceworld.description: Navigate through legendary islands, discover treasures and face dangerous pirates and marines.

onepieceworld.title: Multiplayer Adventures
onepieceworld.description: Join a crew, face other players, or form alliances to dominate the seas.

ancientkraft.title: Custom Magic System
ancientkraft.description: Master unique spells and harness the power of the elements

ancientkraft.title: Enhanced Combat
ancientkraft.description: Experience thrilling battles with improved mechanics and abilities

ancientkraft.title: Vast World to Explore
ancientkraft.description: Discover ancient ruins, hidden treasures, and challenging dungeons

ancientkraft.title: Multiplayer Adventures
ancientkraft.description: Team up with friends or join a faction to conquer the world together

pt-the_full_course.title: Exploration
pt-the_full_course.description: Discover a world full of secrets and surprises to uncover

pt-the_full_course.title: Community
pt-the_full_course.description: Join a friendly and collaborative community of players

pt-the_full_course.title: Custom Plugins
pt-the_full_course.description: Enjoy exclusive plugins that enhance your gaming experience

pt-the_full_course.title: Regular Events
pt-the_full_course.description: Participate in special events and competitions organized by the staff
